name: ASCII Fun #2: Funny Dots
description:
## Funny Dots You will get two integers `n` (width) and `m` (height) and your task is to draw the following pattern. Each line is seperated with a newline (`\n`) Both integers are equal or greater than 1; no need to check for invalid parameters. ## Examples 

                                            +---+---+---+
             +---+                          | o | o | o |
dot(1, 1) => | o |            dot(3, 2) =>  +---+---+---+            
             +---+                          | o | o | o |
                                            +---+---+---+
--- #### Serie: ASCII Fun
  • ASCII Fun #1: X-Shape
  • ASCII Fun #2: Funny Dots
  • ASCII Fun #3: Puzzle Tiles
  • ASCII Fun #4: Build a pyramid
